metadata.name: Randomness Challenge
metadata.description:
I find that I tend to take the same path on most of my normal playthroughs. This mod tries to mix that up with random paths and characters.
There's over 50 paths, including: [list] [*]Mom [*]Mom -> It Lives [*]Mom -> It Lives -> Isaac [*]Mom -> It Lives -> Isaac -> Blue Baby [*]Mom -> It Lives -> Isaac -> Mega Satan [*]Mom -> Mother [*]Mom -> Mother -> Hush [*]Mom -> Mother -> Hush -> Satan [*]Mom -> Mother -> Hush -> Satan -> The Lamb [*]Mom -> Mother -> Hush -> Satan -> The Lamb -> Delirium [*]Ascent -> The Beast [/list]
You can tap the map button to show your path.
None of the paths go past Mega Satan or The Beast, but if you use a mod like AlwaysVoid then you can continue on after Mega Satan if you want.
I haven't seen a random Void portal show up in a custom challenge recently, but if one does then you can always choose to end your run by fighting Delirium.
Right now, trapdoors spawn in the center of the room rather than their normal positions. I might leave this or change it. I haven't made up my mind yet. I like that it feels a bit different.
If relevant: The polaroid and negative aren't required. Knife pieces 1 and 2 are required. Key pieces 1 and 2 will be spawned at the start of your run.
There's 5 challenges that are based around character selection.
[b][u]Randomness Challenge[/u][/b]
This challenge will start you with a random character.
